_source.text: 1. Dwight Howard realizes playing in Houston isn't so bad, as the team around him is much better than the team he'd have in Brooklyn, especially if Deron Williams signs with the Rockets, who he'd have to consider if DH12 considers staying put.

text: 1. Dwight Howard realizes playing in **Houston** isn't so bad, as the team around him is much **better**
**than** the team he'd have in **Brooklyn**, especially if Deron Williams signs with the Rockets, who he'd have to consider if DH12 considers staying put.
